Photo by Rob Casey/SNS Group via Getty Images
Traditional and fan media had press conferences with new signing Aaron Mooy earlier at Celtic Park this afternoon.
Hamish also asked a question in the fan media conference, among the other outlets.
New Celtic signing Aaron Mooy speaking to @67HailHail, and other fan media, earlier today pic.twitter.com/scYhtpcyVE— Hamish Carton (@hamishcarton) July 21, 2022

Reidzo managed to take a photo that wasn’t blurry or contained a crap band pic.twitter.com/rWPIxc8oEV— GIGPOD ⚪️ (@gigpod) July 21, 2022

entry.title: New Celtic signings: Interviews
entry.summary:
Photo by Alan Harvey/SNS Group via Getty Images
Mortiz Jenz and Aaron Mooy, as widely expected a few days ago, officially put pen to paper for the club earlier today. Australian internationalist, Mooy, is reunited with his former manager, having worked under Ange Postecoglou during his tenure with the national team, and he joins the club on a two-year deal. Moritz Jenz is a German central defender who has been playing in the French top flight with Lorient since 2021. Prior to that, the 23-year-old spent five years with Fulham, after which time he had a season in Switzerland with Lausanne-Sport before moving to France. He joins Celtic on a season-long loan, with the club having an option to buy.
Give our Bhoys a follow on Instagram, Celts! #MooySigns! | #WillkommenJenz — Celtic Football Club (@CelticFC) July 19, 2022
The new bhoys gave exclusive interviews earlier today which you can tune into below:
We’ll have a reaction to them on GIGPOD very soon as we gear up for our preview podcast ahead of the Aberdeen game shortly, as well as news for the changes with the show for 22-23! As always you can subscribe on Spotify or iTunes!
